CustomField.formula: OR( AND(ISPICKVAL( FieldType__c , "Number"), OR (ISPICKVAL( Operator__c, "Less Than"), ISPICKVAL( Operator__c, "Less Than Equals"))) ,AND(ISPICKVAL( FieldType__c , "Number"), ISPICKVAL( Operator__c, "Equals"), Number1__c=0) ,AND(ISPICKVAL( FieldType__c , "Number Range"), Number1__c=0) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Is a null value okay for this check?
CustomField.label: SOQL Null Okay
